snippet.title: Wolcen Lords of Mayhem - Console Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wolcen: Lords of Mayhem will be released on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One on March 15, 2023. 

This version of the game will be the final complete edition and will include “Endgame” - the fourth act of the Wolcen story, providing players with a definitive conclusion to the epic adventure that originally began on PC.

Owners of the PC version of Wolcen: Lords of Mayhem will also get Act 4 as a free download on the same date as the console players.

Get Wolcen on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/424370/Wolcen_Lords_of_Mayhem/

Get Wolcen on Epic Games:
https://store.epicgames.com/fr/p/wolcen-lords-of-mayhem-e893e7

#wolcen #sony #microsoft #ps4 #ps5 #xbox #xboxone #xboxseriesx
